game.name: KunKunPrison
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is a fictional story. In the game, you need to gather clues and uncover the secrets of this prison and leave safely. All content in the game is unrelated to reality, and any similarity is purely coincidental.
